title: To Do - A Task Management and Tracking Web App
description: An expanded upon open source project aiming to steamline task management.
content: This app was built by myself and a team of four other developers over the course of four months as a term long project in our capstone software design course. We expanded drastically on the original open source design, implemented many new features and improved accessability.
imgAlt: Sneak peak at the content of the To-Do App homepage.
